name: Kouzuki Momonosuke
effect: [Your Turn] If you have 2 or less Life cards, your Leader gains +1000 power. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may return 2 total of your currently given DON!! cards to your cost area rested: This Character gains [Rush] and +1000 power during this turn. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)
